title: MerryXGift Fuse Beads -11000pcs Iron Beads Set for Kids 36 Colors 5mm Iron Beads for DIY Crafts with 5 Pegboards, 5 Keyrings, 2 Tweezers, Chain Accessories Gifts for Boys Girls
features: ❤ MerryXGift Fuse Beads Kit For Kids DIY Craft Needs. The iron bead set comes with 11,000pcs 5mm midi beads in 36 different colors, 5 pegboard shapes, 2 tweezers, 1 large ironing paper, pattern design booklet, 5 colorful hooks and keyrings, 5 chains and ropes. A variety of accessories and colorful beads bring kids unlimited creative options.

❤ 36 Grids Plastic Storage Box For Different Colors. Instead of mixing beads in jar, MerryXGift iron beads craft kit keep different colored beads separately, which make it easier for you to find the right colour. More convenience for your fuse beads craft making.

❤ Environment-friendly and Kid-safe Material. Our brightly coloured beads are made of non-toxic and premium plastic. No chemicals, no stink and no harm to health. Ideal craft kit for kids age 4 5 6 7 8. NOTE: Kids under 5 year old should be used under the supervision of adults.

❤ Exercise Child's Patience and Eye-hand Coordination. Our iron beads set can settle you and your kids down to design DIY key rings, any 2D or 3D handicrafts, which can enhance kids’ patience, keep kids busy and quiet. It’s also a good way for training childrens’ fine motor skills as well as hand and eye coordination.

❤ Stimulate Kid's Imagination and Creativity. Abundant fuse beads accessories allow kids’ imagination and creativity run wild. And The pattern design booklet provide various cartoon patterns from easy to difficult which is good for both kids and adults to make cute fuse designs. Ideal Gifts for Boys and Girls Who Have Interests in Arts and Crafts.
description: Product Description Why should you choose our MerryXGift Fuse Beads Kit? Wide-usage DIY Craft Kit Increase Parent-child Interaction Abundant Fuse Beads Accessories Stimulate Kid's Imagination and Creativity Environment-friendly Material HOW TO USE this fuse beads kit? 1.Put the beads on the pegboard according to the pattern. 2. Put ironing paper over beads and heated by the iron until the beads stick together. (NOTE: To fuse the design, an iron is required. The iron is not included in the package.) 3. After ironing, press the hard object on the artwork for a few minutes to confirm the crafts stick firmly. 4. Take the finished artwork out. And the pegboard can be repeatedly used to create the next designs. Geat Gift for All the Occasion: Birthday, Easter, Christmas, Halloween, etc. With this Iron beads set, you can DIY key rings, any 2D or 3D handicrafts, photo frame，pencil holders, coasters, cup lip and all kinds of holiday crafts. Perfect Christmas birthday gift and craft kit for kids age 4 5 6 7 8 9 10.
